activities:
TouchCommerce receives personal information from the EU/EEA to enable our customer engagement technology solutions. Using a SaaS delivery model for sales and customer care, the TouchCommerce service engages customers on client websites. The personal information collected enables us to provide services to the customers/visitors of our client’s websites. The information, collected via JavaScript tags or entered by a user into the customer interface, may be considered personal information under the EU directive. This information is collected on TouchCommerce servers on behalf of our clients. The information collected via the TouchCommerce service can include customer contact information (i.e. name and email address), address, customer account number and financial information (e.g. credit card information) required to pay for the services.

Human Resources Data: Employee personal informaton is transferred from the U.K. to the U.S. for TouchCommerce employees in EU
eucountries: France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Netherlands, Romania, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client, Customer Data (Online and Offline Formats)
